original_text: When Rachel saw that she was not bearing Jacob any children, she became jealous of her sister. So she said to Jacob, “Give me children, or I’ll die!”
korean_text: 라헬이 자기가 야곱에게서 아들을 낳지 못함을 보고 그의 언니를 시기하여 야곱에게 이르되 내게 자식을 낳게 하라 그렇지 아니하면 내가 죽겠노라

sentences.original_text: When Rachel saw that she was not bearing Jacob any children
sentences.korean_translation: 라헬이 자신이 야곱에게 자녀를 낳지 않고 있다는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: she became jealous of her sister
